pages.text: $(item)Purebloods$() are natural $(heartless)heartless$() and have a weak will. They get born, when the $(thing)heart$() from somebody is engulfed by $(lissa)darkness$(). Unlilke $(emblem)Emblem-Heartless$() do these set free $(thing)no heart$(), once defeated.
Usually are $(item)Pureblooded Heartless$() black with yellow eyes, but become more colorful the stronger they are.
